pageProduct.name: Alpha Keri Aloe Soothe Intensive Cream 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

3 x Hydration after first application

An extra gentle, super hydrating lotion, containing super ingredient Organic Aloe Vera. It soothes, replenishes, strengthens and protects – providing clinical benefit for extra dry, sensitive and irritating skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis.

Paraben FREE
Perfume FREE
Dermatologist Formula

Warnings

For external use only. If irritation develops, discontinue use.

Common Uses

Soothe, repair and protect dry, irritated skin:

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Glycine Soja Oil, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Octadecyl Di-T-Butyl-4-Hydroxyhydrocinnamate

Directions

Apply to skin as often as required or directed by a Dermatologist (physician). Use after showering, bathing and cleansing.
